Vertical.Markdown:
## Welcome to the Interdisciplinary Studies Module
In this simulated internship at Community 360, you'll apply interdisciplinary analysis to understand the complex issue of high school dropout rates in the community.
Working with supervisor Lianne Park and your intern teammates, you'll investigate causes, review research from multiple disciplines, and develop evidence-based recommendations.

## Comm360 Team Directory
Explore the team directory to learn about your colleagues for this project. Click on each person to see their role, experience, and skills.
Vertical.Navigator:
- id: ty name: Ty role: Intern Teammate photo: /content/sba/images/ty.png bio: Intern at Comm360 focusing on program evaluation and data analysis. experience: 6 months at Comm360 skills: [Data Analysis, Research, Program Evaluation]
- id: peggy name: Peggy role: Intern Teammate photo: /content/sba/images/peggy.png bio: Intern specializing in community outreach and stakeholder engagement. experience: 4 months at Comm360 skills: [Community Outreach, Communication, Project Management]
- id: lacy name: Lacy role: Intern Teammate photo: /content/sba/images/lacy.png bio: Intern with focus on program development and implementation strategies. experience: 5 months at Comm360 skills: [Program Development, Strategic Planning, Implementation]
- id: lianne name: Lianne Park role: Supervisor/Mentor photo: /content/sba/images/lianne.png bio: Director of multiple programs at Comm360 with extensive experience in program evaluation and development. Presents findings to the PDE committee. experience: 5 years at Comm360 skills: [Program Management, Leadership, Strategic Planning, Evaluation]
- id: anne name: Anne Hastings role: Chief Executive Officer photo: /content/sba/images/anne.png bio: CEO of Comm360, making ultimate decisions about programs and resources. Reports to the board of directors. experience: 8 years at Comm360, 15+ years leadership experience skills: [Executive Leadership, Strategic Decision Making, Resource Management, Organizational Development]
